Wh... What are these remnants of destruction?
It is a perfectly round opening, like someone pulled out a cork.
The destruction continues on beyond this room.
These are clearly signs that Avdol and the others encountered an enemy.
Episode 44 The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
It is not by your hand that I bleed.
I had planned to eradicate both you and Avdol all at once,
but he knocked you out of the way.
one would instinctively focus on protecting himself.
This blood is the result of that.
But although I am injured, it will take some time until I die.
I shall go finish off Joestar and the other two!
I will, without a doubt, eliminate them.
I told you over and over not to use your Stand...
Trying to act all cool and shit...
I told you so many times.
Cool Ice said that a mere dog could not have resolve.
That he could not possess a proud soul.
But Stands are the soul's manifestation.
Iggy's soul had moved on its own.
It had no choice but to move.
It is an empty she will.
I am the one who survived!
You are too slow, Cool Ice.
I have really bad luck when it comes to friends.
I was supposed to save Iggy, but instead, he saved me.
I just realized how much I liked him.
I only understand after they are gone.
I thought you were a stubborn, shitty little mutt,
but I loved how you acted so stubborn,
and refused to be friendly with any human.
I realize now that your refusal to show
affection for anyone proved just how proud you really were.
I told you not to save me...
It is because of your stubbornness that...
Dio did something to you, did not he?
You did not notice your body changing?
You received his blood, did not you?
To think you are becoming something I have heard stories about.
You are the same as Dio.
Looks like you started to turn into a vampire
around the moment I stabbed you through the mouth.
Indulge your obsession to the fullest!
You are obsessed with protecting Dio, are not you?
Either way, I have to climb up those stairs
I do not have time to cry in sadness now.
Avdol has died Iggy has died
It has now been 43 days since Jojo and the others departed.
Madam, you are not thinking about stopping at that soba stand, are you?
It is been so long since I have been in Japan.
I am going to have a bite before I go see my daughter.
You hold my little turtle for me.
These places are intended for busy men,
I am going to record a commemorative video.
Have you not told her about her daughter Holly's condition?
she was just visiting her daughter, who had mild pneumonia.
I have served the Joestar family for 30 years,
ever since Miss Holly was in grade school.
I know I should have told her the truth.
So we arrived in Japan before I could tell her.
Miss Holly's strength has run out.
She has only a few days left.
I could tell her, if you would like.
I have lied this long to Madam about Miss Holly.
Is it true that she might be cured if
the man called Dio is defeated?
Miss Holly's body is reacting to an energy called a Stand,
which only certain people can see, and is being overwhelmed by it.
By the evil energy of the man known as Dio...
But when she encounters the shadow of death, she will sense it.
You must go tell Madam Joestar right away.
You should have some curry udon, too.
Madam, there is something I must tell you...
I must get some footage of the
vending machine serving that peculiar energy drink, as well!
This Japanese person is so unique and cool!
Who gave you permission to videotape me, huh?!
Madam, please get back in the car!
Who the hell do you think you are, you foreign granny?!
Want to see some blood, you shitty old woman?
Do not lay a finger on the Madam.
Learn a bit more about Japan.
that Miss Holly only has a few days left.
I cannot bear seeing Madam in shock and sadness.
We have come this far before I could tell her.
The Kujo household is almost in sight.
I must be the one to tell her!
I know there is something you want to tell me.
I already know what is been troubling you.
My daughter's life is in danger, is not it?
When I called her from New York, Holly always sounded cheerful and strong.
She said that she just had a little cold.
Joseph would also call me while he was on the road,
saying that he was doing fine and oh so terribly busy.
that something terrible was happening to my daughter and my husband.
I have lived with my husband for fifty years,
and I gave birth to my daughter, after all.
I was too scared to verify the truth.
The more I wanted to see my daughter,
the more frightened I was to come to Japan.
Since we are discussing it now, we should tell you clearly.
Holly's survival will depend upon these next few days.
Mr. Joestar and the others went to Egypt to address
but I have not heard any news from them yet.
P-Please forgive me for not telling you, Madam.
There was nothing we could do for Miss Holly,
What nonsense are you speaking, Rosas?
There is just one thing we can do for Holly.
The one thing we can do for my daughter
I do not know the details, but I have faith.
If my Joseph and my grandson, Jotaro,
are trying to do something to save my daughter,
then I will believe in them.
Ever since I met that man in Italy fifty years ago,
he has never betrayed my expectations.
Once he decides he is going to do something,
he will follow through, no matter what.
Get better, and we will all be together as a family again.
Cool Ice... Billie Jean... D'Arby Younger...
All of you were fools after all!
I cannot help but belly laugh in sheer satisfaction to think they got what they deserved!
Calling me Nukesaku like I am some moron...
You are the dumbasses who got killed!
Nukesaku, it is impossible for you
to defeat Joestar and the others with your powers.
Let me in on the action, too.
You are nothing more than a vampire.
We will kill you if you do.
I will be the one who finishes off Jotaro!
There is something in front of us, to the right.
Please do not drink my blood!
I will do whatever you say!
I will not try to run away again!
We are not Dio's minions, and we are not vampires.
We will help you, so calm down.
A-Are you really friends, not foes?
We will help you go straight to Hell!
How did you figure it out?!
Is your power having the face of a woman on the back of your head?
You should have at least turned your hands around.
Jotaro, do not knock him out.
Let us have him guide us.
I am immortal, for the blood of Lord Dio is in my body!
Did you just say you were immortal?
So you are a vampire like Dio...
Well, then, I guess I will have to see just how immortal you are.
But even if you are a vampire,
it is still possible to cut you into pieces.
But may I ask you one thing?
How did you know that they call me Nukesaku?
Those curtains were made of some nice cloth.
Now I can move better, and even jump.
but I do not have time to lose heart or worry about pain.
I do not have fond memories of them.
I do not regret this journey.
I-I will tell you everything that just happened.
When did he bring out that Stand?
I shall give you one chance.
